body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gregory Ward and the customer's name is Marilyn Evans.  The conversation is about Happy Animal Shelter (a Animal Shelter ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling ACME Support. My name is John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi John, I need some help with my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Jane Smith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jane. Could I have your account number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. Could you also provide me with your email address associated with the account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jane. I see your account here. How can I help you with it today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I noticed some unusual activity and would like to verify the recent transactions.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern. I’ll go ahead and review the recent transactions for you. Thank you for your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You’re welcome, Jane. Thank you for your time today. If you have any other questions, feel free to call us back. Have a great day!
